data.author: Edmund Burke
data.quote: You must always remember that the only thing necessary for evil to triumph is for good men to do nothing.

data.author: Peppy Hare (Lylat Wars/Star Fox 64)
data.quote: Never give up. Trust your instincts.

data.author: Victor Sullivan (Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception)
data.quote: We don't get to choose how we start in this life. Real 'greatness' is what you do with the hand you're dealt.

data.author: Ignitus (The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon)
data.quote: Even in the darkest of times, there is always hope. But sometimes fear clouds our vision. Sometimes our strength gives out. And yet sometimes, when all seems lost, a light shines through the darkness, and we are reminded that even the smallest amount of courage can turn the tides of war.

data.author: Gouken (Super Street Fighter IV)
data.quote: We are all our own worst enemy. But also our best teacher.

data.author: Sans (Undertale)
data.quote: Take care of yourself, kid. Cause someone really cares about you.

data.author: Chief (Animal Crossing)
data.quote: Don't wish it were easier, wish you were better.

data.author: Braum (League Of Legends)
data.quote: Today we fight each other. Tomorrow, we may fight together.

data.author: Illidan Stormrage (World of Warcraft)
data.quote: You are prepared!

data.author: Waka (Okami)
data.quote: Life is all about resolve. Outcome is secondary.

data.author: Andrew Ryan (BioShock)
data.quote: A man chooses; a slave obeys.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: There are times in life when people must know when not to let go. Balloons are designed to teach small children this.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: It is well known that a vital ingredient of success is not knowing that what you're attempting can't be done.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Fantasy is an exercise bicycle for the mind. It might not take you anywhere, but it tones up the muscles that can.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: If you don’t turn your life into a story, you just become a part of someone else’s story.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I become.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: If you trust in yourself and believe in your dreams and follow your star, you’ll still get beaten by people who spent their time working hard and learning things and weren’t so lazy.

data.author: Terry Pratchett
data.quote: Evil begins when you begin to treat people as things.
